.. _`Troubleshooting`:

Troubleshooting
===============
This section describes some common issues that can arise and possible solutions.

Issue #1
--------
lab 8 - javaScript not runnning correctly

Make sure you have your semicolons!

Issue #2
--------
Any lab invovling a webpage - App.py not running
Make sure you are in the right directory

Issue #3
--------
lab 7 - Database not able to be accessed 
make sure you only have one instance of postgres installed, ideally either 16 or 17
